title: Fragment, 1695–1700
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: damassé (8-harness satin plus plain weave) with floats of continuous and discontinuous supplementary wefts bound on the front in 1\3 twill; the continous supplementary weft is used only to reinforce the gold thread
creditline: Gift of Mary S. M. Gibson
description: Diagonal branches with an exotic bird and blossoms

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1695–1700.
1695–1700. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: damassé (8-harness satin plus plain weave) with floats of continuous and discontinuous supplementary wefts bound on the front in 1\3 twill; the continous supplementary weft is used only to reinforce the gold thread. Gift of Mary S. M. Gibson. 1945-54-5-a/c,f/i.
